glsa.title: Bugzilla: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Bugzilla, the worst of which could lead to the escalation of privileges.

background.p: Bugzilla is the bug-tracking system from the Mozilla project.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Bugzilla. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Privileged account holders could execute system level commands, and the new user process could be exploited to allow for the escalation of privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
